author: tinaslt
content: Hello everybody, I designed a copyright protection system that currently uses the Tokyo cabinet database. I want to design a database based on blockchain to store hashes. Do you have any suggestion? can I use IPFS or Storj? (my code is based on .net)

author: sky.cactus
content: You probably don't want a blockchain for data storage.  IPFS or BitTorrent tend to be better solutions for that.  That being said, this is better suited for <#595721451651465227>.  Also, you are likely to not find a lot of help with copyright protection from the open source community.  ðŸ˜‰
